s: I use gledopto controllers all throughout my house (probably 15 or so) and they're working fine with hue but you have to sacrifice homekit control which I think is worth it because hue brand stuff there isn't enough and prices are too high.

t: Amazon.com: Gledopto Standard Base Multi-Color 12 watt LED Bulb U.S. E26 Base Zigbee Light Link, RGB+CCT Bulb, Works with Google Home and Alexa Through Your Zigbee hub and App
s: I've bought 3 of these bulbs in total to replace some hue colour bulbs. My house has a mix of different brands of zigbee, zwave, and wifi bulbs, and gledopto is definitely my favourite for the price point. The colour and brightness is just as good as what hue offers at a fraction of the price.
